Name: Complete Purchase of Cellphone and Accessories with Checkout Process
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select a cellphone, add to cart, and proceed through the checkout process. Enter shipping and payment details, complete the order, and return to the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to
Step 2: Click on button AddToCart
Step 3: Click on label colorStorageOption (Storage128GB)
Step 4: Click on label colorStorageOption (ColorBlue)
Step 5: Click on button Buy
Step 6: Click on link AddToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 7: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
Step 8: Click on input Email
Step 9: Enter input value in input Email2
Step 10: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
Step 11: Click on input FirstName
Step 12: Enter input value in input FirstName2
Step 13: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 14: Click on input Address
Step 15: Enter input value in input Address2
Step 16: Click on input ZipCode
Step 17: Enter input value in input ZipCode2
Step 18: Click on input City
Step 19: Enter input value in input City2
Step 20: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
Step 21: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
Step 22: Click on link KCellphoneShop -> Navigate to page ''
Step 23: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
